item.title: Genius Gel Super Charged Foundation
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
The Marc Jacobs Genius Gel Super Charged Foundation is a breakthrough gel formula that provides radiance and clarity. Formulated with Buoyancy Gel technology for a weightless, natural veil. An infusion of Soft Focus Powder reflects light to minimize imperfection. Multi-vitamins provide hydration and luxurious wear.
Available in 16 skin-matching shades.
1 fl oz
#MJ-COMPXTION-GEL
item.content:encoded:
The Marc Jacobs Genius Gel Super Charged Foundation is a breakthrough gel formula that provides radiance and clarity. Formulated with Buoyancy Gel technology for a weightless, natural veil. An infusion of Soft Focus Powder reflects light to minimize imperfection. Multi-vitamins provide hydration and luxurious wear.

Available in 16 skin-matching shades.

1 fl oz

#MJ-COMPXTION-GEL

item.title: Remedy Concealer Pen
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
The Marc Jacobs Remedy Concealer Pen refreshes dehydrated and fatigued skin with an all-in-one eraser and brightener. Formulated with an exclusive anti-aging complex. Patented palladium tip cools and smooths skin on contact.
Available in 7 shades. Also available: a universal brightener in 'Bright Idea' and a universal corrector in 'Stand Corrected'.
0.08 fl
item.content:encoded:
The Marc Jacobs Remedy Concealer Pen refreshes dehydrated and fatigued skin with an all-in-one eraser and brightener. Formulated with an exclusive anti-aging complex. Patented palladium tip cools and smooths skin on contact.

Available in 7 shades. Also available: a universal brightener in ‘Bright Idea’ and a universal corrector in ‘Stand Corrected’.

0.08 fl

item.title: Undercover Perfecting Coconut Face Primer
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
The Marc Jacobs Undercover Perfecting Coconut Face Primer uses deconstructed young coconut in a nutrient-rich, perfecting face primer that instantly extends makeup wear, while creating a smooth and improved skin surface.
Key Ingredients:
Concentrated Coconut: Formulated with five forms of coconut, including cold-pressed coconut water, juice and pulp to form a natural, vitamin-rich barrier between your skin and your makeup.
Coconut Water-derived Polysaccharide Complex: Duplicated the effect of synthetic priming ingredients, allowing skin to breathe without compromising skin-perfecting benefits.
item.content:encoded:
The Marc Jacobs Undercover Perfecting Coconut Face Primer uses deconstructed young coconut in a nutrient-rich, perfecting face primer that instantly extends makeup wear, while creating a smooth and improved skin surface.

Key Ingredients:

Concentrated Coconut: Formulated with five forms of coconut, including cold-pressed coconut water, juice and pulp to form a natural, vitamin-rich barrier between your skin and your makeup.

Coconut Water-derived Polysaccharide Complex: Duplicated the effect of synthetic priming ingredients, allowing skin to breathe without compromising skin-perfecting benefits.

item.title: Air Blush Lush & Libido
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: Marc Jacobs introduces Air Blush Lush & Libido, an innovative air powder blush with creamy texture and radiant color that blends seamlessly with your complexion for luminous skin. Two glowing shades merge for endless color combinations. Apply a little or a lot to increase color intensity. Lavish shades, seamless blending, infinite radiance.
item.content:encoded: Marc Jacobs introduces Air Blush Lush & Libido, an innovative air powder blush with creamy texture and radiant color that blends seamlessly with your complexion for luminous skin. Two glowing shades merge for endless color combinations. Apply a little or a lot to increase color intensity. Lavish shades, seamless blending, infinite radiance.

item.title: Capture Totale
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description:
A new generation primer infused with anti-ageing ingredients that corrects all the visible signs of age and recreates the natural perfection of young skin. At the heart of its formula lies a powerful protective shield that protects the deepest youth-creating cells from external factors of aggression and UV rays.
Day after day the skin becomes dramatically more beautiful. Pores are visibly refined and the skin becomes perfectly smooth again.
Its light and fluid texture spreads over the skin like a perfectly even veil, concealing shadowy zones, for a perfect, long-wear make-up result.
item.content:encoded:
A new generation primer infused with anti-ageing ingredients that corrects all the visible signs of age and recreates the natural perfection of young skin. At the heart of its formula lies a powerful protective shield that protects the deepest youth-creating cells from external factors of aggression and UV rays.

Day after day the skin becomes dramatically more beautiful. Pores are visibly refined and the skin becomes perfectly smooth again.

Its light and fluid texture spreads over the skin like a perfectly even veil, concealing shadowy zones, for a perfect, long-wear make-up result.

item.title: Diorskin Airflash
item.dc:creator: brian
item.description: The go-to solution for professional makeup artists, Dior's Airflash is the first revolutionary spray foundation that brings airbrushed perfection to your daily makeup routine.
item.content:encoded: The go-to solution for professional makeup artists, Dior’s Airflash is the first revolutionary spray foundation that brings airbrushed perfection to your daily makeup routine.
